query.commandtext: SELECT RH.HIST_SEQ, RH.TRAN_TIME, RH.EVENT_ID, RH.NEW_UP_DOWN_FLAG, RH.NEW_PRI_STS, RH.LOT_EXIST_FLAG, COUNT(LOT_ID) AS LOT_COUNT, SUM(RL.QTY_1) AS TOT_QTY FROM (SELECT FACTORY, RES_ID, HIST_SEQ, TRAN_TIME, EVENT_ID, NEW_UP_DOWN_FLAG, NEW_PRI_STS, LOT_EXIST_FLAG, HIST_DEL_FLAG FROM MRASRESHIS WHERE FACTORY=:FACTORY AND RES_ID=:RES_ID AND TRAN_TIME BETWEEN :FROMDATE AND :TODATE AND HIST_DEL_FLAG<>'Y') RH LEFT OUTER JOIN MRASRESLTH RL ON RH.FACTORY=RL.FACTORY AND RH.RES_ID=RL.RES_ID AND RH.HIST_SEQ = RL.RES_HIST_SEQ AND RL.RES_HIST_DEL_FLAG<>'Y' GROUP BY RH.HIST_SEQ, RH.TRAN_TIME, RH.EVENT_ID, RH.NEW_UP_DOWN_FLAG, RH.NEW_PRI_STS, RH.LOT_EXIST_FLAG ORDER BY RH.HIST_SEQ

SELECT WM.OPER, OD.OPER_DESC, NVL(SUM(S1_QUEUE_TIME + S2_QUEUE_TIME + S3_QUEUE_TIME + S4_QUEUE_TIME),0) AS QUEUE_TIME, NVL(SUM(S1_PROC_TIME + S2_PROC_TIME + S3_PROC_TIME + S4_PROC_TIME),0) AS PROC_TIME, NVL(SUM(S1_MOVE_LOT + S2_MOVE_LOT + S3_MOVE_LOT + S4_MOVE_LOT),0) AS OUT_LOT_COUNT, NVL(SUM(S1_MOVE_QTY_1 + S2_MOVE_QTY_1 + S3_MOVE_QTY_1 + S4_MOVE_QTY_1),0) AS OUT_QTY_1 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPOPRDEF OD, MWIPMATDEF MD WHERE WM.FACTORY = OD.FACTORY AND WM.FACTORY = MD.FACTORY AND WM.OPER=OD.OPER AND WM.MAT_ID=MD.MAT_ID ??
SELECT RT.RES_ID, RD.RES_DESC, RT.RES_UP_DOWN_FLAG, RT.RES_PRI_STS, SUM(RT.TIME_SUM) AS TIME_SUM FROM RSUMRESTMH RT, MRASRESDEF RD WHERE RT.FACTORY=RD.FACTORY AND RT.RES_ID=RD.RES_ID ??

SELECT FACTORY, RES_ID, DOWN_HIST_SEQ, DOWN_EVENT_ID, DOWN_TRAN_TIME, DOWN_PRI_STS, DOWN_NEW_STS_1, DOWN_NEW_STS_2, DOWN_NEW_STS_3, DOWN_NEW_STS_4, DOWN_NEW_STS_5, DOWN_NEW_STS_6, DOWN_NEW_STS_7, DOWN_NEW_STS_8, DOWN_NEW_STS_9, DOWN_NEW_STS_10, DOWN_TRAN_USER_ID, DOWN_TRAN_COMMENT, DOWN_INTERVAL, UP_HIST_SEQ, UP_EVENT_ID, UP_TRAN_TIME, UP_PRI_STS, UP_NEW_STS_1, UP_NEW_STS_2, UP_NEW_STS_3, UP_NEW_STS_4, UP_NEW_STS_5, UP_NEW_STS_6, UP_NEW_STS_7, UP_NEW_STS_8, UP_NEW_STS_9, UP_NEW_STS_10, UP_TRAN_USER_ID, UP_TRAN_COMMENT, USER_ID_1, USER_TIME_1, USER_COMMENT_1, USER_ID_2, USER_TIME_2, USER_COMMENT_2, USER_ID_3, USER_TIME_3, USER_COMMENT_3, HIST_DEL_FLAG, HIST_DEL_TIME, HIST_DEL_USER_ID, HIST_DEL_COMMENT FROM MRASRESDWH ??
SELECT DOWN_NEW_STS_1, COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT FROM MRASRESDWH ??

SELECT FACTORY, RES_ID, DOWN_HIST_SEQ, DOWN_EVENT_ID, DOWN_TRAN_TIME, DOWN_PRI_STS, DOWN_NEW_STS_1, DOWN_NEW_STS_2, DOWN_NEW_STS_3, DOWN_NEW_STS_4, DOWN_NEW_STS_5, DOWN_NEW_STS_6, DOWN_NEW_STS_7, DOWN_NEW_STS_8, DOWN_NEW_STS_9, DOWN_NEW_STS_10, DOWN_TRAN_USER_ID, DOWN_TRAN_COMMENT, DOWN_INTERVAL, USER_ID_1, USER_TIME_1, USER_COMMENT_1, USER_ID_2, USER_TIME_2, USER_COMMENT_2, USER_ID_3, USER_TIME_3, USER_COMMENT_3, HIST_DEL_FLAG, HIST_DEL_TIME, HIST_DEL_USER_ID, HIST_DEL_COMMENT FROM MRASRESDWH ??
